data.message: Marshall remember when you signed an autograph for me when my ex step moms sister use to babysit hayley for you in warren?  It would have been around 1999- 2001, Someone stole it many years ago when I was still a kid. Can I get another one please? I know you will remember. My step mom was Laura, she is the one who got it for me. I still have hayleys autograph. That she signed when she was around 4 or 5

replies.message: did you smoke crack
Stan stan i founds a Stan
STANLEY
and you just got around to asking for another one now? lol okay

Ive ask my ex step mom if she could get me one but she hasn't communicate with the family in many years but she did say she will see what she can do with getting a hold of them again. But It was stolen when I was real young.  No I don't smoke crack Moad Doghmi. You might but I don't.  I don't give a shit if you don't believe me. My ex step sisters Nicky and Natalie have pictures of them and Marshall together.  If Eminem seen this post he would vow for me.
Hailie..... not Hayley

1st of all Eminem doesn't run his Facebook page. He barely knows how to use a computer. 2nd, No he would not vow for you because even though it was probably one of the most memorable moments in your life, he meets 1000s of fans like you that try to make some weird personal connection with him even though he met you for 10 seconds and forgot about you 5 seconds later.

Hey jay his daughter was babysit by my step mom at the time sister. They babysit til she was around 7 or 8 I believe. So I'm certain he would remember who babysit his daughter. When I first met her at the house in warren she was with her cousin Alina or something like that. They were watching south park the movie. She gave me the finger lol
Cussing and any type of profanity was never allowed in Em's house sooo

Lmao well this girl gave the the finger and she was only like 4. I laughed my ass off so hard. I would have taken a picture... But it was strictly prohibited. At the time I wasn't even allowed to really talk about meeting hailey because for safety reasons. Ill post a picture of her autograph tomorrow when I find it
hmm
Okay Adam but you know it sounds impossible? I am not saying that you're a liar but a lot of people say fake shit
Holy haters. I believe this guy. Good luck man!
Cussing wasnt banned it was just that em didn't curse himself
I hope that he will signed it). And I am sorry for the loss of it((.
Pics or nah
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tnHgho9_FKU&feature=youtu.be  the best remix   listen or die
who cares if they believe you .seem genuine to me
hope for best..good luck my friend.

You got some issues, Stan, I think you need some counselin'
To help your ass from bouncin'
Off the walls when you get down some
And what's this shit about us meant to be together?
That type of shit'll make me not want us to meet each other

Cussing was and still isn't allowed in Marshalls house. 
He raises his kids strictly to NOT be how he was. His music is just a way to speak his mind, let out anger and to inspire others. 
Anybody who follows his words such as the song STAN states you'll be an idiot for doing so.
Hey you might be telling the truth but do you really think he would bother reading the comment or it even be him in the first place.
Adam Marshall I thought that was a hair on my screen then
It's funny how some people think celebrities live in a different planet where they don't mingle with ordinary people.Actually they do read our comments sometimes but rarely respond.Stop the hate.
